Title: Arrival: Outer Pier
Description: Gulls circle a forest of masts. Dockhands curse while stone constructs lift cargo without complaint.
Paragraphs: You disembark into brine air and lantern fog. Refugees huddle under tarps. A ledger booth watches it all.
Salt, tar, and wet timber mix on the air; gulls quarrel above the swell while merchants count coin with red fingers.
